name: v1.6.1 - Version Display & Update Improvements
body:
## UI Improvements

### Version Display
- **Main menu header** now shows version (e.g., `P16 GPU Server Setup  v1.6.1`)
- **Tools menu** shows current version next to Update option
- **Update screen** shows current version vs available version

### Update Screen
```
Current version: v1.6.0
Latest version:  v1.6.1

Update available: v1.6.0 â†’ v1.6.1

Download and install update? (y/N):
```

### IP Address Fix
- Header now shows **current** IP address (not from netplan config)
- IP updates when server IP changes

### How to Update
```
server-setup > Tools & Monitoring > Update server-setup
```
